para.text: We want to apply the Seepage parameter to the well flow rate for the Disposal_Pond object. To do that, open the Object Properties dialog box by double-clicking on the Disposal_Pond object on the top view of the model. Then, on the MODFLOW Features tab, select "Seepage" as the
can be left at the default value of

. Note that besides the PEST parameters, you could also choose the Kx data set because it is a data set that is modified by PEST. In this case choosing Kx does not make sense. You could also could have set the value of the Seepage parameter to 0.03 and instead of specifying a PEST modifier, you could just have used Seepage as the formula for the pumping rate.
